title: Abandoned coal mines can cause acid mine drainage

content.question: Which of the following is an environmental problem associated with abandoned coal mines?

choices.label: Thermal pollution of streams in the area
Acid drainage due to leaching of spoil heaps by rainwater
Air pollution caused by smog from ozone formation
Released nutrients that cause eutrophication into streams

content.answer: Acid drainage due to leaching of spoil heaps by rainwater
